params.maxOffers: Maximum number of offers to process

params.loanId: ID of the loan to create an offer for
ID of the loan to liquidate

returns._0: Array of active loan IDs available for liquidation

returns.filteredOffers: Array of loan IDs that meet criteria

returns.canTriggerHealthCheck: Whether enough time has passed for next check
returns.healthCheckInterval: How often global health checks can be triggered
returns.lastHealthCheck: Timestamp of last global health check

returns.totalLiquidated: Total number of loans liquidated through this manager
returns.totalOffers: Total number of liquidation offers created

returns._0: Full details of the liquidation offer

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params.maxLoans: Maximum number of loans to check in one transaction

returns.loansChecked: The number of loans that were checked

createLiquidationOffer(uint256).notice: Create a liquidation offer for an unhealthy loan

executeLiquidation(uint256).notice: Execute a liquidation by repaying the loan and claiming the collateral

getAllOffersWithStatus().notice: Get all liquidation offers with their current status

getLiquidationOfferDetails(uint256).notice: Get liquidation offer with additional computed fields

getOfferDetails(uint256).notice: Get details of a liquidation offer

triggerGlobalHealthCheck(uint256).notice: Trigger a global health check of all active loans
